observation: Nonwovens (Non Wovens) | Nonwoven (Non Woven) Fabrics | Nonwoven (Non Woven) Material | US Felt  Home Company Process Products SAE Felt Specs Applications Economy Friendly Contact Search Specializing in Natural Fiber Nonwoven (Non Woven) Fabrics and Materials US Felt is an innovative manufacturer and fabricator of nonwoven (non woven) fabrics, felt and composite materials. As our commitment to you, our customer, we will strive: To deliver solutions to all your product needs and requirements using world class standards To provide exceptional service unsurpassed in our industry, and To form a sound, enduring relationship by gaining your trust and confidence. US Felt is pleased to announce we have diversified our business and are able to provide the following services: Thermoplastics Injection Molding & Mold Maintenance Custom Printing Logo Embroidery Pad Printing Customer Product Storage In our heated warehouse facilities Custom Assembly & Sewing Quality Inspection Packaging Use our website to find information on the product you need our company get in touch with us © 2000-2022 US Felt Mfg. Inc. 61 Industrial Avenue, Sanford Industrial Estates, Sanford, ME 04073  • 207.324.0063 ISO 9001-2015 Certified | Eco-Friendly Nonwovens (Non Wovens) Felt Nonwoven Technologies

thought: The text content of the website seems to be related to a company that specializes in nonwoven fabrics and offers a variety of services. There are no obvious signs of scams from the text alone, such as unusually low prices or impossible claims about money. However, the company makes a point of emphasizing trust and confidence, which can sometimes target psychological weaknesses. I should verify the legitimacy of the company and the contact information provided.

thought: The search results show a mix of information, including a company profile and reviews from employees. This suggests that US Felt is a real company with a presence in the industry, but I still need to confirm the legitimacy of the website associated with this company.

There are no Reddit posts about usfelt.com, which limits the amount of user-generated content I can analyze for potential scam reports. However, the lack of negative information could also indicate that the site is not widely known as a scam. I should continue my investigation by checking the DNS records to see if there is anything unusual there, as well as looking for any security certificates that might lend credibility to the site.

The DNS records show a typical setup with SPF, MX, A, NS, and SOA records. Nothing stands out as suspicious here. The SPF record is set up to prevent email spoofing, and there are multiple MX records for handling email. The A record shows the IP address of the server hosting the website. To further assess the credibility, I should check for any SSL/TLS certificates that might be associated with the website.

thought: The website has a valid SSL/TLS certificate issued by cPanel, Inc. Certification Authority. This adds a layer of credibility as it shows an effort to secure customer data with encryption. No red flags have been raised from the DNS records or the SSL/TLS certificates. However, I have not been able to validate the claims about the company or find user experiences that could indicate a scam. I also have not been able to verify the updated nature of the website information, the appropriateness of the inquiry phone number and email address, or the payment methods used. Without more concrete evidence, I cannot confirm if the website is a scam based solely on the information gathered. Given the limitations of the tools at my disposal and the information obtained, my final answer will be based on the absence of typical scam indicators rather than the presence of definitive proof. I now know the final answer Based on the tools used and observations made, there is no conclusive evidence to classify http://www.usfelt.com/ as a scam website. The website appears to be for a legitimate business, and there are no immediate scam characteristics evident from the information available.
